variables.label: OpenSpeedTest Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/openspeedtest/latest/tags

instructions.start: OpenSpeedTest is a self-hosted speedtest. You can read more about this on https://openspeedtest.com/selfhosted-speedtest.
instructions.end: OpenSpeedTest has been successfully deployed! You must enable https for the app to work. Go to the app setting and enable https.

description: OpenSpeedTest is a self-hosted network speedtest written in vanilla Javascript.
